DOC.brief_summary: The Dietary Approaches Stop Hypertension ( DASH ) trial show reduce blood pressure plasma total LDL-cholesterol ( C ) compare Western diet , show benefit blood lipid variable associate cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) risk , namely HDL-cholesterol triglyceride . The overall objective study determine whether modification DASH diet substitute carbohydrate fat result improvement multiple biomarkers CVD risk . Specifically , investigator test hypothesis modification DASH diet reduce carbohydrate , primarily form simple sugar glycemic starch , allow liberal intake total saturate fat , primarily dairy food , : ( 1 ) improve lipoprotein marker CVD risk ( reduce total/HDL-C ratio , apolipoprotein B , small LDL particle , increase HDL-C , apoAI , large HDL particle ) ; ( 2 ) result comparable reduction systolic diastolic blood pressure achieve standard DASH diet . The investigator also assess effect modify DASH diet marker insulin resistance inflammation . Our main hypothesis test controlled dietary intervention conduct 40 healthy men woman randomly allocate consume , 3 week , control Western diet , standard DASH diet , modify low-carbohydrate DASH diet , separate 2-week washout period .
DOC.brief_title: Effects High Fruit , Vegetable , Dairy Intake Plasma Lipids Blood Pressure Healthy Individuals
DOC.criteria: Age 22 year old Average systolic blood pressure < 160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure 80 95 mm Hg measure 2 separate day Nonsmoking Agrees abstain alcohol dietary supplement study Willing consume study food instruct History coronary heart disease , cerebrovascular disease , peripheral vascular disease , bleed disorder , liver renal disease , diabetes , lung disease , HIV , cancer ( skin cancer ) last 5 year . Taking hormones drug know affect lipid metabolism blood pressure . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 35 Total LDLcholesterol > 95th percentile sex age . Fasting triglyceride > 500 mg/dl . Fasting blood sugar ( FBS ) > 126 mg/dl . Abnormal thyroid stimulate hormone Not weight stable Pregnant breastfeeding
